name: Metal Flop Extreme
description:
Be aware it can be a challenging rage game lol,  but are you GAMER enough?

You are a UFO from the Metal Slug world and your objective is to reach the high speeds and get the highest score.

It is far from finished but if it gets some attention I will definitely do it,

thinking to eventually: make pipes move when player reach certain score,  adjust gravity and flop mechanics, give the game an actual ending unlike the original flappy bird, add some memes because why not :D.  give me some ideas.
